snippet: A man accused of inappropriately touching two teenage girls while posing as an actor from the "Twilight" movie series was allowed to meet with students at an Iowa middle school and was confronted but not arrested after the first alleged incident, ...
lead_paragraph: A man accused of inappropriately touching two teenage girls while posing as an actor from the "Twilight" movie series was allowed to meet with students at an Iowa middle school and was confronted but not arrested after the first alleged incident, one of his accusers says.
